alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 4:46AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, Victoria, northeastern Goliad and north central Refugio Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 446 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weesatche to near Saxet Lakes to near Bloomington. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Goliad, McFaddin, Guadalupe, Fannin, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Weser, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Downtown Victoria, Fordtran, Schroeder and Dacosta. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 644. US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 604. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 830. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
